objects.text:
• Luxurious Cotton Cover
• High-Density Fiber Fill
• Hypoallergenic Material
• Perfect for All Sleep Positions

Embrace luxurious comfort and
heavenly sleep at an exclusive price!

product_details.name: Premium Comfort Pillow - Cloud-Like Softness for Perfect Sleep
product_details.description:
• Luxurious white cotton cover for maximum breathability
• High-density polyester fiber fill for optimal support
• Hypoallergenic material - ideal for sensitive sleepers
• Standard size (20" x 26") fits most pillowcases
• Machine washable for easy maintenance
• Maintains shape after prolonged use
• Perfect balance of softness and support
• No-shift construction prevents lumping and bunching
• Durable stitching for long-lasting quality
• Ideal for all sleeping positions

banner_details:
The banner is cleanly divided into four quadrants using pastel background blocks, creating a balanced layout. The top-left features a bold heading (**heading**) in a large, dark blue font with subtext (**subheading**) and a promotional tag (**tagline**) in lighter shades. The top-right quadrant showcases the product (**product_image**) prominently against a light blue backdrop, adding visual focus. 

The bottom-left quadrant presents key features (**description**) as bullet points, followed by a bold price tag (**price**) in orange. Below that is a call-to-action button (**cta_button**) with white text (**cta**) over a dark blue rectangle. The bottom-right contains an inspiring italic tagline (**tagline_2**) and supportive text (**description_2**), enhancing the luxurious appeal.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Periwinkle (#E0EAFF)  
- Powder Blue (#D6E1FB)  
- Soft Peach (#FBBF77)  
- Pale Apricot (#FFDCAA)  
- Deep Navy (#3A4F8A)  
- Golden Orange (#E29539)  
- Light Lavender (#6F8ED1)  
- Warm Brown (#754C24)
product_color: The product image highlights a minimalist aesthetic, dominated by a clean, soft white pillow (#F7F7F7) that represents purity and comfort. The subtle use of warm golden yellow accents (#FCCE6B) in the background pillow adds a gentle vibrancy and contrast. The smooth blending of these hues maintains visual harmony while allowing the white to remain the focal point. Slight gray shadows (#D1D1D1) add depth without overpowering the softness. These colors together enhance the product’s plush and inviting feel. For an advertisement banner, a palette of White (#F7F7F7), Golden Yellow (#FCCE6B), Light Gray (#D1D1D1), and a hint of Warm Beige (#FFF2DE) can be used.
